text: ( Source : Bacardi Limited ) Multi-channel campaign puts consumers at the heart of the activation Hamilton, Bermuda , October 12 , 2015 - Today , BACARDÍ® rum unveils a fresh, new take on the brand with a 30-second TV spot , experiential House
